title: Interpreting a $z$-Score: Alan's Bench Press Strength
question_text:
Alan's trainer told him that the standardized score ($z$-score) for his bench press is $1.3$ compared to other men his age.
Which is the best interpretation for this standardized score?

choices.text: Alan's bench press is $1.30$ times the average bench press of other men his age.
Alan's bench press is $1.30$ above the average bench press for men his age
Alan's bench press is $1.30$ below the average bench press for men his age.
Alan's bench press is $1.30$ standard deviations above the average bench press for men his age.
Alan's bench press is $1.30$ standard deviations below the average bench press for men his age.
